entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:26 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 10:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
